actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to protect homes, small businesses, and other private property rights by limiting the power of eminent domain.
short_title: Protection of Homes, Small Businesses, and Private Property Act of 2012
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Protection of Homes, Small Businesses, and Private Property Act of 2012 - Declares that the power of eminent domain shall be available only for public use, which shall not include economic development. Applies such limitation to all exercises of eminent domain by the federal government or by state and local governments using federal funds.

titles.title: Protection of Homes, Small Businesses, and Private Property Act of 2012
Protection of Homes, Small Businesses, and Private Property Act of 2012
A bill to protect homes, small businesses, and other private property rights by limiting the power of eminent domain.
